Text:
can't get it to finish installation. it always crashes.  I'm on win7 32bit @3.5GHz quad
any help?
Torrent has a toolbar installer that Avast! and Malwarebytes picked up as malware.
When I click "install" on their gay installer, it simply stop and say "something went wrong in the install thread" or something like that.
Ditto. After downloading it for 4 days, tried to install it in Windows 7, 64bit and Î got "Something went wrong in the installation thread". Do not download!!!

@Cinereus: I also had that problem, but i copied everything from the folder SKIDROW into the installation folder, and it worked... 
PS Sorry for my bad  english :P

Couldn't run due to virus, so extracted and then got rid of it that way. tried to revert it to a .iso file and mount on a imager but it would only allow me to view the files instead of run it as an install disc. any help?
Gave up, virus could be a false-positive, but I'd rather not take the chance since this computer was expensive.
